text: KidsTv..
“Look at the Christmas Snowman!”

Snowman Snowman
He’s a Christmas Snowman

Standing in the sun all day
He loves to get a slow tan

I sing a merry song
I can be quite a showman

Snowman Snowman
I'm a Christmas Snowman

I'll be sure to tell him
You've been a good boy

I'm sure you'll get presents
And love galor

Something yum to eat
Or a lovely Christmas toy

I could be ballerina
